item.title: Some Drawings of The Lion King
item.description:
Some Drawings of The Lion King

I've been sick recently- I came down with a really bad cold. Not good. But, I do have a lot of spare time on my hands, so I started watching some videos by Aaron Blaise, and then I wanted to draw some of the characters from The Lion King (which I haven't seen in for ever-- sorta random, but hey, that's life ðŸ‘Œ.)

I 'm on a mission to making one drawing everyday for one year. (Or Â more! Start out small I guess though)

item.title: A Judy Hopps Animation
item.description:
A Judy Hopps Animation

I thought I was done drawing stuff from Zootopia (Rich Moore already retweeted the last drawing I did, soÂ insert George Costanza GIF here), but after seeing this D23 video, I had to give it a shot!

item.title: I Gotta Go See the Movie now!
item.description:
I Gotta Go See the Movie now!

I gotta go see the movie now, after the director retweeted my drawing! But really, I'm happy with how it turned out!

item.title: Some JonTron Memes I Made
item.description:
Some JonTron Memes I Made

I made these two 'memes' (I guess you could call it that) involving JonTron. The final video will be finished soon, but for now you can enjoy this real painting that's real and an incredibly inspirational quote in their full resolution.
